mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_param(
id, type_id, type_code, param_name, param_code, param_value, ranking, description, param_value_type_enum, state_enum, delete_enum, tenant_id, create_date, create_user_id, update_date, update_user_id, delete_date, delete_user_id )VALUES
(
